name: Forest Dungeon
description:
You are trapped inside a dungeon, but have no memories of how you got there. Your only goal is to get out and get to safety.

A simple and short horror/ thriller game.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

[ESC] & [P] = Pause game

[Left Mouse] = Interact

[WASD] = Movement

-----------------------------------------------------------------

EXTRA:

There is a brightness slider if your game looks too dark in the settings menu.

This is the first horror game i've made so I kept it very simple for now...
I'm planning on making more horror games, so follow me on Itch to stay up to date!

If you would like to support me you can donate any amount for future projects. :)
